rules.name: Unlimited Liability Clause
rules.description: This clause exposes you to unlimited financial liability, meaning there's no maximum cap on damages you could owe.
rules.recommendation: Negotiate a liability cap or maximum amount you could be held responsible for.

rules.name: Auto-Renewal Without Notice
rules.description: The contract automatically renews without requiring notice, potentially trapping you in unwanted commitments.
rules.recommendation: Request an opt-in renewal process or require advance notice before renewal.

rules.name: Unilateral Modification Rights
rules.description: The other party can change the contract terms at any time without your consent.
rules.recommendation: Require mutual consent for modifications or limit changes to non-material terms.

rules.name: Broad Indemnification Clause

value: shall indemnify from any and all

rules.description: You must defend and compensate the other party for any claims, even if they're not your fault.
rules.recommendation: Limit indemnification to claims arising from your negligence or breach.

rules.name: Broad IP Assignment
rules.description: You automatically assign all intellectual property rights to the other party, even for work done outside the contract.
rules.recommendation: Limit IP assignment to work specifically created for this contract.

rules.name: Severe Penalty Clause
rules.description: Contract includes harsh financial penalties that may exceed actual damages.
rules.recommendation: Negotiate reasonable penalty amounts tied to actual potential losses.

rules.name: Inconvenient Jurisdiction
rules.description: Legal disputes must be handled in a specific jurisdiction that may be inconvenient or unfavorable.
rules.recommendation: Negotiate for mutual jurisdiction or arbitration in a neutral location.

rules.name: Difficult Termination Terms
rules.description: Exiting the contract is difficult or expensive, potentially trapping you in unfavorable terms.
rules.recommendation: Negotiate termination for convenience with reasonable notice period.

rules.name: Perpetual Confidentiality
rules.description: Confidentiality obligations last forever, which may be unreasonable for information that becomes public.
rules.recommendation: Limit confidentiality to 3-5 years or until information becomes publicly available.

rules.name: Complete Warranty Disclaimer
rules.description: The other party provides no guarantees about quality, functionality, or fitness for purpose.
rules.recommendation: Request specific warranties for core functionality and merchantability.
